title: Dragon’s Raja - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Game   Adapted to Manhua   Dragons   Late Romance   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Jiangnan   江南
description: When Lu Mingfei was applying for a foreign university, he received an invitation letter from Cassel College, a private university in the outer suburbs of Chicago. Under the call of mystery, under the choice of love and dream, he resolutely chose the unknown future. Black helicopters flew across the sky, the gate of a strange country was slowly opened to him: The door of becoming a dragon slayer.>
